name: Plan Your Business
description: Have a strong business plan in place to guide your business to success.

name: Get Ready to Legalize Your Business
description: Research the timeline and costs associated with starting your business to prevent delays and unexpected costs.

name: Register and Form Your Business
description: Get your business legally recognized by the State and federal government to comply with laws.

name: After Registering Your Business
description: Enter insurance and/or location agreements in your business’ name to protect your business and you personally.

name: Before Opening Your Site
description: Obtain industry specific approvals or inspections to make sure you’re in compliance with State or local laws.
